Scenario Builder

Begin understanding your plant in new ways. Streamlyne builds relationships between assets, sensors, and new user-generated input so you can track what is going on, when it's going on, and why it's going on through graphical visualizations. As Streamlyne collects daily information from your systems you can begin tracking the anomolies in processes that may be devastating to your plant. Use this information to create safety standards, process limits, historical references, situation alerts, and reports to share.



Dashboard

This is the main landing area where you can monitor the custom scenarios that you've built between your assets, sensors, and user information. On one screen you have a live snapshot of the processes that matter most to you.


Alerts

Streamlyne is constantly reading and analyzing data through our algorithms to alert you before things go wrong. Instantly be alerted when assets are reaching maximum or minimum thresholds, the probabilities of malfunction, and the liklihood of a negative event happening. You can also see what other assets may be affected to monitor them as well.
